name: Techwars Global Conflict - Prosperity Legacy
description:
TechWars Global Conflict is the world’s first isometric mecha PVP-Action with direct control.

Prosperity Legacy gives you new premium Prosperity Legacy skins.

This Bundle includes: Fisher mech Prosperity Legacy premium skin Steelfied mech Prosperity Legacy premium skin Jupiter mech Prosperity Legacy premium skin Wolfram mech Prosperity Legacy premium skin Flatout mech Prosperity Legacy premium skin Wyvern mech Prosperity Legacy premium skin Tetra mech Prosperity Legacy premium skin Gladiator mech Prosperity Legacy premium skin TechWars: Global Conflict - The Game
